description: This file defines and exports functions that interact with a recipes API, including listing recipes, getting recipe details, searching recipes, and listing reference categories and diets.

methods.name: listRecipes({ page = 1, pageSize = 9, category = '', diet = '' } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of recipes, optionally filtered by category and diet.

methods.name: getRecipe(id)
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific recipe by ID.

methods.name: searchRecipes({ q = '', page = 1, pageSize = 9, category = '', diet = '' } = {})
methods.description: Performs a search for recipes based on a query string, with pagination and optional filtering.

methods.name: listCategories()
methods.description: Lists available recipe categories or provides default categories if the API call fails.

methods.name: listDiets()
methods.description: Lists available diet types or provides default diets if the API call fails.

ctags.name: listRecipes
ctags.pattern: /^export async function listRecipes({ page = 1, pageSize = 9, category = '', diet = '' } = {}) {$/

ctags.name: searchRecipes
ctags.pattern: /^export async function searchRecipes({ q = '', page = 1, pageSize = 9, category = '', diet = '' }/
